DataElement.preferredName: Genome Assembly Custom FASTA File Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name of the custom assembly fasta file used during sequence alignment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An annotated assembly of genome sequences created by the assimilation of data pieces from numerous sources.:To make according to individual requirements or specifications; to make more personalized or tailored for a specific need._A text-based file for representing either nucleotide or amino acid sequences, with the nucleotides or amino acids represented using single-letter codes. In addition to the sequence, the file contains a sequence name and a description of the sequence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An annotated assembly of genome sequences created by the assimilation of data pieces from numerous sources.

Concepts.definition: An annotated assembly of genome sequences created by the assimilation of data pieces from numerous sources.

Property.preferredDefinition: To make according to individual requirements or specifications; to make more personalized or tailored for a specific need._A text-based file for representing either nucleotide or amino acid sequences, with the nucleotides or amino acids represented using single-letter codes. In addition to the sequence, the file contains a sequence name and a description of the sequence.

Concepts.definition: To make according to individual requirements or specifications; to make more personalized or tailored for a specific need.

A text-based file for representing either nucleotide or amino acid sequences, with the nucleotides or amino acids represented using single-letter codes. In addition to the sequence, the file contains a sequence name and a description of the sequence.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
